trans-unit.source: Creating Custom Types using PowerShell Classes
trans-unit.target: 使用 PowerShell 类创建自定义类型

trans-unit.source: We’ve improved the PowerShell language for defining classes and other user-defined types by using formal syntax and semantics that are similar to other object-oriented programming languages.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用类似于其他面向对象的编程语言的语法和语义改进了用于定义类和其他用户定义的类型的 PowerShell 语言。

trans-unit.source: The goal is to enable developers and IT professionals to embrace PowerShell for a wider range of use cases, simplify development of PowerShell artifacts (such as DSC resources), and accelerate coverage of management surfaces.
trans-unit.target: 目标是使开发人员和 IT 专业人员在更广泛的用例中使用 PowerShell，从而简化 PowerShell 项目开发（如 DSC 资源），并加速覆盖管理面。
此版本中受支持的方案

trans-unit.source: Define DSC resources and their associated types by using the PowerShell language
trans-unit.target: 使用 PowerShell 语言来定义 DSC 资源和与其关联的类型

trans-unit.source: Define custom types in PowerShell by using familiar object-oriented programming constructs, such as classes, properties, methods, etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用熟悉的面向对象的编程构造（例如类、属性、方法等）在 PowerShell 中定义自定义类型。

trans-unit.source: Inheritance support with class in PowerShell and class base DSC resource
trans-unit.target: 使用 PowerShell 中的类和基类 DSC 资源的继承支持

trans-unit.source: Debug types by using the PowerShell language
trans-unit.target: 使用 PowerShell 语言调试类型

trans-unit.source: Generate and handle exceptions by using formal mechanisms, and at the right level
trans-unit.target: 使用正式的机制以及适当的级别生成和处理异常
